summary_gpt: BLS International Services Limited has canceled its scheduled investor/analyst meet with Muddy Waters Asia due to business exigencies, as per their recent disclosure. This update amends their earlier announcement about the event planned for May 6, 2025.

BLS International Services Limited has scheduled a one-on-one investor/analyst meeting with Muddy Waters Asia on May 6, 2025, to discuss the company's financial and operational performance based on publicly available information. No unpublished price-sensitive information will be shared during the meeting.

BLS International Services Limited announced the successful acquisition of Beijing Biaoshi Enterprise Consulting Co. Ltd., completing the transaction as part of its strategic expansion. The acquisition was previously disclosed in late 2024 and early 2025, and the update confirms its completion.
